channel.title: Comments on: Degrees of separation: Talking Heads and Joy Division

item.title: By: Marilyn Roxie
item.dc:creator: Marilyn Roxie
item.description: Wow, I had never heard about this before...now that I'm listening to the song again, I definitely hear the correlation. "The Overload" might go well with this Post-Punk box set I'm working on: http://rateyourmusic.com/list/MarilynRoxie/rym_ultimate_box_set__post_punk/
item.content:encoded: Wow, I had never heard about this before…now that I’m listening to the song again, I definitely hear the correlation. “The Overload” might go well with this Post-Punk box set I’m working on: http://rateyourmusic.com/list/MarilynRoxie/rym_ultimate_box_set__post_punk/
